contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.description: The ways to contact me, either by email, phone or social networks.
contactPage.headline: Get in touch with me!
contactPage.enableJs: JavaScript must be enabled to view the email address and phone number. This is done to prevent scrapers and spam.
contactPage.intro: The easiest way to contact me is through my email address: Enable JS. You can also use WhatsApp with the phone number Enable JS.
contactPage.socialMedia: You can also find me on some social networks:

homePage.title: Home
homePage.welcome: Welcome to my website. My name is Ariel, and here you will find information about me and my projects.
homePage.whoAmIDesc: I am a web developer who likes to learn new things and share knowledge. I enjoy programming, web design, and creativity. I love creating new things and learning from others.
homePage.whatIDoDesc: I currently work as a software developer and Cloud administrator at a technology company. I develop web applications in PHP and deploy them in the cloud securely and efficiently.

trajectoryPage.title: Trajectory
trajectoryPage.description: My trajectory as a software developer, with information about my education, work experience and projects I have worked on.
trajectoryPage.headline: My trajectory as a developer
trajectoryPage.intro: I am a software developer living in Vigo, Spain. I love technology and I enjoy learning new things. I am professionally dedicated to software development in all its aspects: from architecture design, implementation and production deployment, to other aspects such as user experience, accessibility and security.
trajectoryPage.techDescription1: I mainly master the Microsoft ecosystem: .NET (C#), ASP.NET Core, SQL Server, Azure and Azure DevOps. I also have experience with other languages and technologies, such as PHP, Python and Java. Additionally, I have frontend knowledge with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and TypeScript.
trajectoryPage.techDescription2: I also have experience with DevOps tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform and GitHub Actions; as well as the Azure Cloud ecosystem.
trajectoryPage.efsetCert1: Official EF SET C2 Proficient Certificate
trajectoryPage.efsetCert2: : certifies my C2 English level, the highest according to the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages.
trajectoryPage.azureDeveloperCert2: : certifies my knowledge in Azure application development.
trajectoryPage.azureDevOpsCert1: Microsoft Certified: Azure DevOps Engineer Expert
trajectoryPage.azureDevOpsCert2: : certifies my knowledge in implementing DevOps methodologies in Azure with Azure DevOps and GitHub.
trajectoryPage.higherTechCert1: Higher Technical Certificate in Multiplatform Application Development
trajectoryPage.higherTechCert2: : higher vocational training degree, obtained at
trajectoryPage.estelaria2: Full-stack application development, mainly in PHP with Symfony, MongoDB and Vanilla JavaScript. In addition, I implemented a considerable number of improvements in usability, accessibility and performance.
trajectoryPage.estelaria3: I am also responsible for managing the infrastructure on AWS, and implementing collaboration tools such as Jira and GitHub.
trajectoryPage.polygon2: I did my professional training internship at Polygon-E, where I developed several internal management applications with ASP.NET Core and Blazor, deploying on on-premise environments with Windows Server, IIS and SQL Server.
trajectoryPage.projectsDescription: You can find the (public) projects I have worked on in my portfolio and on my GitHub profile.

portfolioPage.title: Portfolio
portfolioPage.description: A list of projects I have worked on in recent years, with the technologies used.
portfolioPage.headline: My portfolio
portfolioPage.intro: In this section, you will find a list of the projects I have worked on, both for third parties and my own. If you would like more information about any of them, please do not hesitate to contact me.
portfolioPage.freelanceDesc: I have developed projects for third parties by commission, the most notable being the following:
portfolioPage.orderExtractorDesc: Desktop application that extracts data about online orders from various platforms (such as WooCommerce, Amazon, and eBay). More information.
portfolioPage.touristInfoTitle: Tourist Information Point on Mobile Devices
portfolioPage.touristInfoDesc: Web application for tourist information, with QR codes, 360Â° content, and YouTube embedding. More information.
portfolioPage.wpConsultingDesc: Maintenance, optimisation, and migration work for WordPress websites and WooCommerce online shops. More information. Contact.
portfolioPage.ownProjectsDesc: Additionally, I have several personal projects that I have developed in my own time, some of which are active and open source.
portfolioPage.personalWebDesc: Developed with Astro, a static site generator that lets you write content in Markdown and publish to the web with excellent performance. Deployed on Azure Static Web Apps.
portfolioPage.mientrenoDesc: Web application for managing sports training, with a simple and easy-to-use interface. Developed with ASP.NET Core, Razor Pages, and SQL Server. More information. Source code.
portfolioPage.vigo360Desc: Blog about Vigo and its surroundings, mainly focused on mobility and toponymy. Developed in Go, with a MySQL database and deployed on a VPS managed by myself. More information. Source code. Website.
